about.name: Cairo
about.info_text: Cairo is the vibrant capital city of Egypt, known for its rich history, ancient landmarks, and bustling streets. Located on the banks of the Nile River, Cairo is a city that bridges the past and the present. Visitors can explore iconic attractions such as the Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and the Egyptian Museum, which houses an extensive collection of artifacts from ancient Egypt. The city is also a hub for lively markets, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture. Whether you're interested in exploring history, savoring local flavors, or experiencing the energy of a bustling metropolis, Cairo has it all.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 10 million
Official Language: Arabic
Currency: Egyptian Pound (EGP)
Time Zone: Eastern European Time (EET, UTC+02:00)
Climate: Desert climate with hot summers and mild winters.

attractions_card.title: Pyramids of Giza
attractions_card.description: Visit the world-famous Pyramids of Giza, including the Great Pyramid, and marvel at these ancient wonders.

attractions_card.title: Sphinx
attractions_card.description: Admire the enigmatic Sphinx, a colossal statue with the body of a lion and the head of a pharaoh.

attractions_card.title: Egyptian Museum
attractions_card.description: Explore the Egyptian Museum in Tahrir Square, home to a vast collection of ancient Egyptian artifacts.

attractions_card.title: Khan el-Khalili Bazaar
attractions_card.description: Shop for souvenirs, jewelry, spices, and textiles in the bustling Khan el-Khalili market.

attractions_card.title: Coptic Cairo
attractions_card.description: Discover the historic Coptic Christian neighborhood with ancient churches and religious landmarks.

attractions_card.title: Islamic Cairo
attractions_card.description: Wander through the winding streets of Islamic Cairo, home to historic mosques, palaces, and monuments.

attractions_card.title: Citadel of Saladin
attractions_card.description: Visit the Citadel of Saladin, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering panoramic views of the city.

attractions_card.title: Nile River Cruises
attractions_card.description: Enjoy a cruise on the Nile River, with dinner, entertainment, and scenic views of the city's landmarks.

food_card.title: Egyptian Cuisine
food_card.description: Savor traditional Egyptian dishes, including koshari, falafel, shawarma, and delicious desserts like baklava.

food_card.title: Street Food
food_card.description: Taste the flavors of Egyptian street food, from savory fuul sandwiches to sweet and flaky pastries.

food_card.title: Mango Juice
food_card.description: Cool off with fresh mango juice, a popular and refreshing beverage available at local juice stands.

food_card.title: Egyptian Tea and Coffee
food_card.description: Experience the culture of tea and coffee in Egypt, often served with sweet treats and hospitality.

food_card.title: Middle Eastern Sweets
food_card.description: Indulge in a variety of Middle Eastern sweets, including kunafa, basbousa, and qatayef.

hotels_card.title: Luxury Hotels
hotels_card.description: Stay in luxurious hotels with modern amenities and views of the Nile River or historic landmarks.

hotels_card.title: Boutique Hotels
hotels_card.description: Discover boutique hotels in the heart of Cairo, offering a blend of comfort and style.

hotels_card.title: Budget Accommodations
hotels_card.description: Find budget-friendly hostels and guesthouses for economical travel options.

hotels_card.title: Historic Stays
hotels_card.description: Experience the charm of historic hotels with unique architecture and character.

transport_card.title: Cairo International Airport
transport_card.description: The main international gateway to Cairo, with connections to domestic and international destinations.

transport_card.title: Metro and Buses
transport_card.description: Use the Cairo Metro and public buses for affordable and efficient transportation within the city.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available for convenient transportation, but it's advisable to negotiate fares in advance.

transport_card.title: Horse-Drawn Carriages
transport_card.description: Enjoy a nostalgic ride in a horse-drawn carriage, a charming way to explore historic areas.

transport_card.title: Walking and Bicycles
transport_card.description: Explore the city on foot or by bicycle, especially in areas like Old Cairo and Zamalek.
